title: I got straight perma'd with no suspension or any chat restrictions?
body:
I recently had to games where i got reported and it triggered a response
the one i just played was admittedly pretty rough because i was a little drunk but that was a rare occurrence for me and the other one was me arguing with an autolocker who pushed me out of my lane and to support a day or two ago. I can understand if i got chat restrictions or a suspension but a permanent ban right off the bat? I think i had chat restrictions one time months and months ago this seems a little random. If i could get a rioter to tell me if this was fair or not it would really help. I used a lot of money on that account and it straight up getting banned with no suspension or chat restrictions seems a little outrageous to me. I truly don't think this is permanent ban material.

replies.body:
While Necromancy may be handy (and sometimes needed) in video games, it's not the case for old forum threads. Please avoid using such magic and be mindful of how old threads are before posting.

Feel free to contact us at the [Moderation Discord](https://discordapp.com/channels/230113905668653056/306220435262144512) or at [Discuss the Boards]( https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) for any questions, comments or concerns about this. Thank you and have a good day.
my friend had an acount 0-perma at lvl 1 and said "obama is the worst president in the history of the usa" and went str8 to perma evendently any criticisim to obama is considered hate speach
That didn't happen.
he did say it like 80 times in 1 game

> I got straight perma'd with no suspension or any chat restrictions

You've had a chat restriction. But that aside from that, yes .. your behavior was bad enough for a direct perma-ban, even without that.

Good thing that you want people to reform but don't let them the opportunity to do it . Yeah make them rage more and they will be passive aggressive toxicity forever , not just typing the forbidden words will be enough for not triggering the system but yet they will remain toxic . 

" But he already had a chat restriction " 

this punishment is risible , i had many of them and it never bothered like " oh damn it feels good to not be chat restricted anymore " , it is anywhere  close of a good warning .
Hey Tantram I got another OT but player behavior related question I wanted to ask you, is that ok
Post the logs? And if there was any racism, there is a 0 tolerance policy.

>
> Post the logs? And if there was any racism, there is a 0 tolerance policy.

With how many times i've been called n***** and the other person wasn't punished I doubt there's zero tolerance for racism.

No, there definitely is. The reason you think this is because it takes getting reported to get punished. Someone could be toxic as radioactive waste and not get punished just because no one reported him...

The first one is the drunk one, its pretty typical just cursing and but its not like i said heil hitler or said anything racist, just typical rage.
The second one is the one where i was arguing with the guy who autolocked and pushed me out of my lane and in that one i dont think i cursed at all and if i did then like once or twice. Suspension material because of the first one? Absolutely understandable but a perma ban? Keep in mind this is a rare occurance for me as well I haven't gotten a chat restriction in MONTHS. I wish it would show what the other guy was saying in the one i was arguing it would help my case a lot.

ohhh u know what its cuz a said F A G G O T isnt it? Even then a perma ban? I didn't get a warning and not even usually toxic, now that i see dropped the big f bomb like twice i can understand sort of but perma ban with no suspension for one game seems a little excessive.

Looking at the logs again I really can't see the big deal. The times i dropped the F bomb ok. But even then it seems like the reasonable response to that would be a chat restriction I said once or twice i think? A word i dont even use like ever and i did in one game in a fit of drunken rage. From what it looks like im basically getting straight banned with no suspension or chat restrictions over 2 words? That again I like NEVER say. I really really dont think this is fair. Again i'll state AGAIN, i am not normally like that EVER, i used to be a rager but i have it mostly under control now and i havent gotten a punishment in months and months. Most of you can agree this is like suspension material right? Im getting crucified over words I never use and probably won't use again in one game where i drunk and even then it wasnt even that over the top.
Told people to kill themselves, racial slurs and general douchebaggery. Consistent through all 3 games. More than enough to skip tiers.

Like i said the first game was understandable I was being toxic to most of my team and the enemy team (I was being camped by a zac vs a jayce top with no help try to sympathize a little.) The second game I was talking to one person and it was somebody who autolocked yasuo in champ select and then walked down the lane i called and i was arguing with him why he did it. There was no third game btw, just these two.

The f-bomb as you call it can be used without fear of punishment. "Fuck, that was a close fight." no problem.

When you harass a person, it's harassment. "Fuck you, jerkwad" that is not ok.

> [{quoted}](name=Active Anarchist,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=i7xozRiJ,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-06-07T16:49:55.397+0000)

> Active Anarchist: kill urself
> Active Anarchist: u locked yasuo cuz ur a fucking retard scumbag

all of those lines contain specific words or ideas considered hate speech by Riot and will lead to increasing the punishment level. The rest of the chat is all negative and would be punishable even without those lines.

Punishment goes 10 chat restriction, 25 chat restriction, 14 day ban, permanent ban.
Understandable, not saying at all what I did was right but again this is my first punishent. I'm like never toxic this was a one time thing.

Understandable, not saying at all what I did was right but again this is my first punishent. I'm like never toxic this was a one time thing. And by F bomb i mean the more modern one (the one for homosexuals).

I always am on the boards looking at peoples chat logs when they feel they were treated unfair by the ban system, and I gotta say, your logs are near the top in terms of toxicity. SO many messages, so many rules broken. Enjoy making a new account.

Yep.  Ban deserved.

 - Told people to kill themselves
 - Called people pejorative/homophobic slurs
 - Were generally toxic and not at all enjoyable to play with

and I'll also add...

 - You talk WAY too much in games, clearly.  If you're typing that much it indicates that you're not focused on playing and likely did terribly. 

I didn't look at your match history, but there's no way you're not a feeder based upon what I see in this chat log.

I did the fine in both games. The one where I was super toxic I had a super big lead and then my team started to fall off. Like i said also this is a one time thing and I may have anger management issues but i NEVER int or feed. I play till the end no matter what. Go look at my match history if u want.

You told people to kill themselves, you called them slurs, and in general you were being extremely rude to them.

I would say that the behavior presented in those chat logs is something that would escalate the punishment.

In 1 game on a basically spotless record. Not saying what I did was right, but im getting perma banned with no warning on whats basically my first offense? No inting or hacking or afk just toxicity in 2 games. And one of them wasnt even me being toxic the guy autolocked and forced everybody to play around him.
There's certain behavior that Riot deems completely unacceptable even on a first time basis. Riot shouldn't need to warn you that the behavior you presented in those chat logs is unacceptable.
You actually reposted it and still can't figure out what you did? lol. I would advise that you seek professional help for whatever it is you've got.

I do to but i thought it was a little ridiculous too. This is my first punishment as far as im aware and like i said im never usually like this.
I read the first 5 lines and stopped reading..... Perma deserved.

> [{quoted}](name=Wolfcub2000,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=i7xozRiJ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-06-07T08:36:36.261+0000)

that's what happened to my level 15 account I payed $500 dollars on.. but I learned my lesson so I haven't got an account banned since ^-^

> [{quoted}](name=porcha,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=i7xozRiJ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-06-07T08:59:26.785+0000)
>
> that's what happened to my level 15 account I payed $500 dollars on.. but I learned my lesson so I haven't got an account banned since ^-^

Why would you spend $500 on an account you haven't even reached 30 on

Certain behavior can escalate your punishment. The type of behavior that gets escalated is usually behavior that you should never exhibit to another stranger, and thus shouldn't need to be told to not behave in that manner. Being drunk doesn't excuse your actions.

Like others have mentioned, post the logs. And the amount of money you put into your account is irrelevant to how many chances you get, especially if you violated the code of conduct with something that has a zero tolerance policy.
i counted f bomb 35 times

- You told players to kill themselves.
- You used hate speech.
-  you continued to herass more then playing the game.

Let me just make this clear. If you skip right to perma ban with no other punishments before it means you are so toxic that the community does not think you will reform even if given the chance.

Looking at the logs provided, they are right.

If you skip right to perma ban status it means you are the worst of the worst. A community member who is so toxic they cant be helpped and simply must be removed  Riot has a 0 tollerance policy on death threats and hate speech to begin with. But even general toxic behaviour you displayed was beyond extreme.

The messege to you is a powerful one. Leave and never come back.

Your ban is very well deserved. I hope you use this experience to improve your attitude towards others in the future.

Riot has a zero policy for hate for the LGBT community.  Using any slurred insult of that community or a slurred insult of a minority is an instant irrevocable permanent ban.  Most of Riot is ran by LGBT and minorities.  You can't use those words.

I'm African American, when people say N I G G E R or anything of that type it doesnt affect me in the least. First off its the internet and secondly I have a backbone. I just dont see how I said a couple slurs in one game and I get perma'd with no previous punishments. If i had any punishments it would have been a chat restriction and that had to have been months and months ago when i was still like lvl 5. Can you honestly say that i'm worthy of being perma banned because of two games two days apart, one me getting mad at someone being difficult and unresponsive for no reason forcing people to switch roles cuz they dont feel like communicating. Then the other being admittedly toxic but literally the first I have ever had a game like that. When it comes down to it im basically being banned for using a slur twice in one game. First punishment is a ban for two words.
It's a game with a ToS. Follow it.

So basically i'm getting banned for violating a rule, one which I haven't even heard of, because the robots they use to punish people selected me out of the thousands who say what i said constantly and don't get reported on it? What it's coming off as is almost random. I know countless of people and streamers who int and feed and are toxic and they are back on the next day. I'm toxic one time on a spotless account and I got permanently banned. Not because of what I said necessarily but because I happened to get "caught" for it. How can a game be proactive about trying to handle toxicity and instead of having people gauge the situation its a robot. Comes off as sloppy and careless tbh. You're on here saying things like that acting like you have never said anything like I said in the chat logs. Flat out lies. You know what this game's staff remind me of? The thought police from 1984. I'm an upstanding citizen in a sea of toxicity and people who feed and afk. I'm toxic twice in two games over the course of two days and im banned while idiots who intentionally ruin games run free......absurd.
Btw im looking everywhere and I can't find anything with clear set of rules on toxicity. For people who care so much about conduct it sure is hard to find the rules.

You weren't looking very hard.
Toxic defined by riot. 
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player

You got the ban you deserved. I can tell by how you are acting on here that you're lying to us. This isnt your first punishment, nor is it an abnormal thing for you to act like this haha. Good luck in dota.

poor people getting their feelings hurt by mere words

must be rough living with such weakness huh

To judge if it was permanent ban material or not we'd have to see the chat logs in question, sadly. If the community agrees that they're not you can occasionally get a Rioter popping in to check. Note that they WILL notice if you've altered the logs in any way, so, if you want any legitimate traction, post the full, uneditted logs.
Guys i just got banned i didnt recive a notifivation it just says im currently banned i dont know why any help?

It's likely a bug. I've had the same thing happen to me. It will prevent you from selecting a queue while listing the reason as being banned, but you're not actually banned.

Try logging out and back in.

And like YerroFever mentioned, don't necro old threads, especially ones mostly unrelated to your issue. Create your own.

> [{quoted}](name=ToxicBunny21,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=i7xozRiJ,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2018-11-10T19:51:09.820+0000)
>
> Guys i just got banned i didnt recive a notifivation it just says im currently banned i dont know why any help?

1) Don't necro old threads. 

2) Open a new thread. However, I'll tell you that you'll get the following responses:

 - Wait for the email that corresponds to the ban. It can take a few days to get to you and then post on the forums about what is in your ban email. 
 - If you don't want to wait for the email, you can contact player support and open a ticket to find out more info.
 - If you have no info on your ban notice, your ban may be a shield ban and you should contact player support anyway. If it is a shield ban, they will ask you a series of questions to make sure you are the true owner of the account and then unlock it for you.

I highly suggest opening a support ticket or do live chat if they're up and running right now.

ban well deserved. let's see what you did

hate speech
suggestion of suicide
overall douchery

yep... enjoy your ban. and don't bother making a smurf. we don't want you back
Psst. This was like a year ago.
